mapper.select: SELECT title, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate FROM tbl_event
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event (title, start_date, end_date) values(#{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_event WHERE title = #{title} AND start_date LIKE CONCAT(#{startDate}, '%') AND end_date LIKE CONCAT(#{endDate}, '%')
